body:
Just as everybody knows, I recently made a youtube channel, and I made a Video Hub for that, this is not my Video hub but the other one is called "Sam's Video Hub" and when with a new video "Sam's Video Hub [NEW VIDEO].
And I would like with all of my heart that you guys watch my videos, subscribe to my channel and giving me feedback (pls nothing like "SUPER BAD VIDEO" or anything, like just what i can do better or that the video is good!

Thanks! 

-Sam

title: i made a video hub 3 days ago

replies.body: If you would like people to nice your h, please refrain from creating an entire thread about it. Instead, bump the hub with a relative comment. Thanks!
